DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: Tab configuration: Attributes of the tab node
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Attributes of the <tab> node

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Name of the first <xsd:element> placed in the tab.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: If only one element (typically a nested content with sub-elements) should appear in one tab, the element's name can be hidden. Therefore, set collapse="true". Otherwise, omit it, or set it to false.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Define the name shown in the tab. This attribute supports %(key.) macro to insert localized messages. If the attribute is not given, the element's name is used as the tab name.
